body.name: sofree bedding Queen Size Mattress, 10 Inch Memory Foam Hybrid Mattress Queen, Pocket Spring Mattress in a Box for Motion Isolation, Strong Edge Support, Pressure Relief, Medium Firm, CertiPUR-US
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 16 hrs 48 mins
features: Pocket Spring for Better Support: Our hybrid mattress queen constructed by hundreds of individual pocketed spring coils which offers you with enough support from head to toe and the hybrid construction create medium-firm feel, no worry about sagging. The queen bed mattress added high-density foam and reinforced coils to enhance edge support, avoid the feeling of falling, and give better protection for you and your families.

Premium Material for Health: Sofree bedding queen size mattress adopted 3D soft knitted fabric on the top cover which is breathable and moisture-absorbing, the memory foam inside queen mattress is CertiPUR US Certified for safety & durability, friendly for all people including pregnant and kids, you can sleep on our mattress queen size with confidence.

Suitable for All Sleepers: This 10 inch mattress queen size is ergonomically designed to conform your curves and keep spinal alignment, relieve pressure points and let go of your fatigue. The comfort memory foam layer can support your body in every position to provide a whole night of peaceful sleep, it is ideal for all body types and sleep styles.

Motion Isolation for Soundly Sleep: The individual innerspring pocket coils in our queen bed mattress work independently, it tends to reduce noise and isolate motion when you move, effectively avoid movement interference between partners, create a quiet and undisturbed sleep with this pillow top memory foam mattress.

Package & 100 Nights Trial: Our mattress ships compressed, rolled, and boxed in packaging. Simply unbox, unroll and safe to sleep on, please wait 48-72 hours to fully expand and any potential odor to dissipate. You will get 100 nights trial and 10 years support for this queen mattress. We commit to offer you a good sleep, please feel free to contact us at any time for support.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For those seeking an economically sound mattress option, this product stands out as a commendable choice. Its exceptional comfort, characterized by a soft and relaxing texture, became evident during a 30-minute trial, inducing a sense of imminent restfulness. It's worth noting that the borders on the sides exhibit a slight reduction in support. Nevertheless, the overall mattress quality is impressive, offering a superb balance between comfort and back support, making it an excellent investment for those prioritizing a comfortable sleep experience.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This is truly a great mattress, I’m really enjoying it. It is perfect height and softness and even better price. Feels like I’m on vacation, 100% worth it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for a kid
reviews.reviewText: We upgraded our 9 yo's bedroom which included a bigger bed. I ordered this mattress because of the price point and considered using it for myself but quickly decided to let her keep it. It's soft, sure, and she sleeps fine on it but for an adult who is used to a certain level of support, it wouldn't do for me. It's too "giving" and lacks a firmness that's not going to make my back hurt in the morning.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars First mattress in a box and couldn't be more impressed
reviews.reviewText: This was my first time ever buying a mattress in a box. In fact, I was expecting a giant mattress sized box similar to what TVs come in. I was surprised when it showed up and the mattress was rolled up in a smaller box.I had read other reviews about this mattress and those ratings and reviews led me to buy this. They all mentioned to be careful when slow when opening it as it might pop out. I heeded that advice and am glad I did. Please be careful and slow to avoid it unrolling and popping out.Once it was unrolled, directions were super easy to follow. Just it breathe for 8-72 hours (the longer the better) and you can sleep.This mattress is incredibly comfortable and supportive. It's not too soft or firm. I don't feel like I'm sinking and sleeping on quicksand on it but also doesn't feel like I'm sleeping on the pavement. This mattress is the perfect balance and I cannot believe I got it on Amazon for such a low price. I definitely will be getting another when the time comes for a new one!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Heavily damages the health and worst sleep
reviews.reviewText: I am writing this after using this product for 4 months. The worst ever product and all wrong information on the description. It now damaged my health, it badly injured my shoulder and back muscle. Never had a good sleep but I thought I will get used to it. Could not return as its another headache to return mattress after you open it. Please read following points which are absolutely WRONG in the production description mentioned by the company.1.Pocket Spring for Better Support - Company is not honest here. Every place you put ur hand or foot or your back you will feel like that part is dropping inside. No support at all.2.Premium Material for Health: - They mentioned its friendly for kids and pregnant lady. Its. BIG NOOOO. Please do not buy it for your kids neither for pregnant lady. It will damage them heavily and badly.3.Suitable for All Sleepers: - NOOOO, not true. Buy this product only if you lobe to sleep on a trampoline or you are buying it for jumping purpose.4.Motion Isolation for Soundly Sleep: - Ohh GOD, its completely wrong information. The product does opposite to it.They offer 100 night trial, but its my bad I didn't realize it and could not return this. and now am writing it only after I got sever pain due to this mattress. But still I will try to contact their support.But please stay away from this particular mattress as it will severely damage your health. I will look for options to sue this company for selling this product with wrong information.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Definitely worth the price
reviews.reviewText: I looked intently for a plush mattress and have been happy with this one so far! Most certainly for the cost, it has been worthwhile. We've been sleeping more comfortably since the first night, although I did also invest in a nice mattress topper as well. Hopefully the longevity is there, only time will tell.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for price
reviews.reviewText: Good for price. Soft edges as all the reviews state. Good for cheap replacement.. middle is good. Wouldn't count on it for the long term.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and big 12in
reviews.reviewText: This mattress was thick and soft. We got the 12-in mattress and it's very thick on putting it on the bed. My mom is 5'1 and we put this 12-in mattress on a 14-in bed frame and it's still to high for her but she manage and live it. The 18 in bed frame was way to high her for her height and weight because the mattress made it really thick but but other than that 10 out of 10 must have is so soft and comfortable and she haven't slept good in a very long time until she got this mattress. The picture is a 18inc frame and 12inc mattress
